snippet.title: Pixel Noir - OFFICIAL CUTSCENE TEASER - Detective JRPG
snippet.description:
Who can you trust when you can't trust yourself? That's the question, but you'll have to do some serious sleuthing before you have a chance at figuring it out, gumshoe. #PixelNoir invites you down the path of a detective fighting to come to terms with a traumatic past. 

Launches on Steam, February 8th.
Pixel Noir: https://store.steampowered.com/app/754320/Pixel_Noir/?utm_source=yt

#JRPG #IndieGameDev  #noir #steamdeckverified
